definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
surname Yi/(Tw) abbr. for 義大利|义大利[Yi4 da4 li4], Italy

nationalism/national self-determination/principle of nationalism, the first of Dr Sun Yat-sen's 孫中山|孙中山 Three Principles of the People 三民主義|三民主义 (at the time, meaning parity between China and the great powers)/racism

pinyin: Ma3 ke4 si1 Lie4 ning2 zhu3 yi4

sentences.english: Post-impressionism reflected a number of the same attitudes as symbolism in literature.
sentences.chinese: 後印象派反映了大量與文學象徵主義相似的態度。

sentences.english: Marxism faith is magistral faith of China.
sentences.chinese: 馬克思主義信仰是中國社會的主導信仰。

sentences.english: And Trump's governing concept shows a strong inclination toward neo-isolationism.
sentences.chinese: 從其執政理念看，新孤立主義傾向明顯。
我就是一個自戀主義者。

sentences.english: Just show me one county where Dr. Sun's principles have been put in practice.
sentences.chinese: 你給我指出哪一個縣實施了孫中山先生的三民主義？

sentences.english: The white racists tried to keep down the Indians by force.
sentences.chinese: 白人種族主義者企圖用武力壓服印第安人。

sentences.english: The Traditional Institutionalism investigated the history regarding institution as the focus.
sentences.chinese: 傳統制度主義以制度爲中心來考察歷史。

sentences.english: What is the theoretical background of the Formalistic Approaches ?
sentences.chinese: 形式主義批評的理論背景是什麼？

sentences.english: The libtard morons got change but for the worse.
sentences.chinese: 自由主義白癡們改變了，但卻變得更糟。

sentences.english: The main characteristic of Atwood's ecological thought lies in the anti-anthropocentrism.
sentences.chinese: 阿特伍德生態思想的主要特徵是反對人類中心主義。

sentences.english: There are also humanitarian uses for sniffer bees.
sentences.chinese: 嗅探蜂還能應用於人道主義援助。

sentences.english: Shu Bote living in classicism and romanticism of the transition period.
sentences.chinese: 舒柏特生活在古典主義和浪漫主義的交接時期。

sentences.english: Shu Bote living in classicism and romanticism of the transition period.
sentences.chinese: 舒柏特生活在古典主義和浪漫主義的交接時期。

sentences.english: Some of the women-teachers are usually proud of their position of being a Diana.
sentences.chinese: 有些女教師常常以保持獨身主義地位而自豪。

sentences.english: The theory of constructionism contributes to the psychology teaching.
sentences.chinese: 建構主義理論對於心理學教學改革有着重要的啓示。

sentences.english: After all, this is male chauvinism at play in.
sentences.chinese: 說到底，這也是大男人主義在作怪了。
